title: Flipped Learning-Based Advanced Science Job Competency Course

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science theory and practical work experience
context.additional_context: Customized blended learning program combining smartphone-based pre-learning and offline advanced activities to improve workplace application by in-service practitioners.

learning_goals: Explain core scientific concepts with over 85% accuracy through flipped learning
Improve discussion and project execution skills during class by 70% using pre-learning materials
Collaborate with peers and instructors to develop scientific approaches for solving real-world workplace problems

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
